TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WebPageTraceListener extends System.Diagnostics.TraceListener

summary.span: 提供一个将 消息定向到 ASP.NET 网页输出的侦听器。

span.span: Provides a listener that directs messages to ASP.NET Web page outputs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 特性应用于此类具有以下属性值： 。The attribute applied to this class has the following property value: . 不影响桌面应用程序（通常通过双击图标、键入命令或在浏览器中输入 URL 来启动这些应用程序）。The does not affect desktop applications (which are typically started by double-clicking an icon, typing a command, or entering a URL in a browser). 有关详细信息，请参阅类或[SQL Server 编程和宿主保护属性](~/docs/framework/performance/sql-server-programming-and-host-protection-attributes.md)。For more information, see the class or [SQL Server Programming and Host Protection Attributes](~/docs/framework/performance/sql-server-programming-and-host-protection-attributes.md). 类将转发跟踪消息写入到ASP.NET Web 页输出通道上的进行日志记录。The class forwards trace messages that are written to the log to ASP.NET Web page output channels. 可以通过添加启用跟踪转发对象将 Web.config 文件中的侦听器以[trace 元素 （ASP.NET 设置架构）](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/05f08d15-1e2c-4c56-84d1-b1d7ba039af6)的子节[ <system.diagnostics>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/system-diagnostics-element.md)部分。You can enable trace forwarding by adding a object to your Web.config file as a listener in the [trace Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/05f08d15-1e2c-4c56-84d1-b1d7ba039af6) subsection of the [<system.diagnostics>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/system-diagnostics-element.md) section. 您还可以添加到 listeners 集合以编程方式。You can also add a to the listeners collection programmatically. 通常情况下，这可通过添加期间应用程序启动时，向该集合使用`Application_Start`Global.asax 文件中的方法。Commonly, this is done by adding a to the collection during application startup, using the `Application_Start` method in the Global.asax file. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将路由消息到 Web 窗体输出。The following code example demonstrates how to route messages to Web form output. 此代码示例说明一个典型的 Web 窗体包含和控件。The code example shows a typical Web form containing a and control. Web 窗体上启用跟踪和呈现时，跟踪输出将追加到 Web 窗体。Tracing is enabled on the Web form and trace output is appended to the Web form when it is rendered. 您可以检查中的跟踪消息**跟踪信息**跟踪输出的表。You can examine the trace messages in the **Trace Information** table of the trace output. 如果已启用正确在配置文件中，您看到这两个类别的跟踪消息`"Trace Test"`。If you have enabled the correctly in your configuration file, you see both trace messages with the category `"Trace Test"`. 但是，如果你尚未启用，请参阅仅跟踪消息写入到对象。However, if you have not enabled the , you see only the trace message that is written to the object. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Trace_2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Trace_2/CS/form2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Trace_2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Trace_2/VB/form2vb.aspx#1)]

span.span: ASP.NET Tracing Overview

summary.span: 使用指定的系统数据和事件数据将事件消息写入网页或写入 ASP.NET 跟踪查看器。

span.span: Writes an event message to a Web page or to the ASP.NET trace viewer using the specified system and event data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将事件消息写入对象使用`source`作为类别和`message`作为消息。The method writes the event message to the object using `source` as the category and `message` as the message.

summary.span: 使用指定的系统数据和事件数据将本地化的事件消息写入网页或 ASP.NET 跟踪查看器。

span.span: Writes a localized event message to a Web page or to the ASP.NET trace viewer using the specified system and event data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法调用方法，传递`format`并`args`并使用属性格式字符串设置为要写入到跟踪查看器或网页的消息。The method calls the method, passing `format` and `args` and using the property to format the string as the message to write to the trace viewer or Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法不会写入输出，即使在配置文件中启用的对象。The method does not write to the object output, even if it is enabled in the configuration file.
